text: yaayyuha l-nabiyu idha tallaqtumu l-nisaa fatalliquhunna liʿiddatihinna wa-ahsu l-ʿidata wa-ittaqu l-laha rabbakum la tukh'rijuhunna min buyutihinna wala yakhruj'na illa an yatina bifahishatin mubayyinatin watil'ka hududu l-lahi waman yataʿadda hududa l-lahi faqad zalama nafsahu la tadri laʿalla l-laha yuh'dithu baʿda dhalika amran
